DESCRIPTION: The away from keyboard (or AFK) command allows you to set an auto respond message to anyone who mentions you, when enabled.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}afk** ~ Enables / Disables your personal AFK message.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}afk [your message here]** ~ Set your personal AFK message.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: â€¢ Advanced: You can also set your afk message with a custom made embed!
ALIASES: AFK does not have any aliases.
MESSAGE_UPDATED: You have successfully updated your AFK message! AFK status not automatically activated, please make sure it is enabled.
STATUS_ISENABLED: You have successfully **ENABLED** your AFK message.
STATUS_ISDISABLED: You have successfully **DISABLED** your AFK message.
INVALID_JSON: The message you provided for your AFK message, was not valid JSON code. There is some error in the code. Please try and use the embed builder to generate valid JSON code. https://leovoel.github.io/embed-visualizer/
